synopsis.text: Tomoshibi: Mini Toji no Miko brings together beloved characters from the original Toji no Miko TV series and its accompanying smartphone game, all reimagined in adorable miniature form! Follow the daily lives of these pint-sized katana maidens as they navigate a world filled with both battles and moments of peace. Don't miss out on this exciting new take on the Toji no Miko universe, excluding the recap episode 0.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
